text.autoconfig.islandutils.title: Opzioni di Island Utils
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.showO: Mostra anteprima dei cosmetici solo nel menu dei cosmetici
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.showG: Mostra il gioco che stai giocando
Show the Details of your current game (e.g. Round, Players Remaining)
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.showT:
Show how long is left in your current game
(Disabling will always show time elapsed)
Show how long you've been playing on island!
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.showF: Show your current Faction and Level.
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.toast:
Adds a pop-up in the top right when your items have finished crafting

§e§l[Only shows if you are playing on MCCI]
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.chatN: Adds a chat message when your items have finished crafting
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.notif: Aggiunge un'icona nella lista dei server quando i tuoi oggetti hanno finito di fabbricare.
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.sendS: Sends segment in chat after you complete a level
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.showT: Enables the timer bar which shows your current segment time and your improvement over a saved segment
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.showS: Shows your improvement over a saved segment in the timer bar, medal title and in chat
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.showT: At what time should the segment improvement time start showing in the timer bar
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.clear: This will clear all of your saved segments. These can not be recovered.
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.saveM:
How to save splits

§lBest Time§r: Uses your best time on each segment

§lAverage Time§r: Uses your average time on a segment
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.pause: Adds an extra confirmation screen before you disconnect
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.showF: Show which friends are in your game
When you join a game, a message will be put in chat with the friends in your game
Show which friends are in your lobby
When you join or change lobbies, a message will be put in chat with the friends in your lobby
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.silve: Shows all the items you'll earn in the Scavenging menu
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.chann: Shows the chat channel switcher buttons above the chat box
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.hideS: Hide Sound Sliders if not Online
Hides the Music Sliders if you're not on MCC Island
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.class: Classic Hole In The Wall Announcer
Adds back the announcer from the original HITW map by Noxcrew!
Musica di Hole In The Wall classico
Adds back the music from the original HITW map by Noxcrew!
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.enabl:
Enables the Config Button in the top left of the options menu

§c§lWARNING! §rIf you disable this and you don't have another way to access the config (ModMenu), you will be unable to access the config in-game!
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.showO: Shows the plobby join code on-screen
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.showI: Shows the lobby code while in games
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.showF:
Opens the text sources folder

Contents:
code.txt -> Auto-updates with the current plobby join code
text.autoconfig.islandutils.option.debug: Enables: Chat debug logs, Custom Item ID tooltips & Other debug features
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.islanduti: Una mod di utilità per MCC Island!
modmenu.summaryTranslation.islandutils: Una mod di utilità per MCC Island!
